summary: Implements a basic Deep Convolutional Generative Adversarial Network (DCGAN) using PyTorch, defining lightweight generator and discriminator modules, initializing model weights, and providing a standalone training routine for image synthesis on the CelebA dataset.
business_intent: Offer an educational reference and quick-start example for developers and researchers to experiment with GAN-based image generation and to benchmark or extend DCGAN training pipelines.
